sourcesContent:
export const consts = {
    ROWS_AMOUNT: 8,
    COLUMNS_AMOUNT: 8,
    POSES_ROOK: [0, 7],
    POSES_KNIGHT: [1, 6],
    POSES_BISHOP: [2, 5],
    POSES_QUEEN_WHITE: 3,
    POSES_QUEEN_BLACK: 4,
    POSES_KING_WHITE: 4,
    POSES_KING_BLACK: 3,
}

export enum Colors {
    WHITE = 'white',
    BLACK = 'black',
}

export enum FigureNames {
    PAWN = 'pawn',
    ROOK = 'rook',
    KNIGHT = 'knight',
    BISHOP = 'bishop',
    QUEEN = 'queen',
    KING = 'king',
}

export type Nullable<T> = T | null;
